feed.title: theausinstitute TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from theausinstitute

entry.title: Gas as a transition fuel? Doesn't really make sense, when the proposed Middle Arm LNG facility will have lifecycle emissions equal to 12 coal-fired power stations. #auspol #climatechange
entry.content: Gas as a transition fuel? Doesn't really make sense, when the proposed Middle Arm LNG facility will have lifecycle emissions equal to 12 coal-fired power stations. #auspol #climatechange

entry.title: Think offsets are our way to Net-Zero? Think again. The majority of carbon offsets are flawed, they aren't used to cover all emissions, and we're even dramatically underestimating our emissions. #auspol #climatechange
entry.content: Think offsets are our way to Net-Zero? Think again. The majority of carbon offsets are flawed, they aren't used to cover all emissions, and we're even dramatically underestimating our emissions. #auspol #climatechange

entry.title: The official unemployment rate significantly underestimates the actual number of people looking for work. Our research found there are 3X more people looking for work than the official 'tip of the iceberg' number states! Lilia Anderson and Matt Grudnoff
entry.content: The official unemployment rate significantly underestimates the actual number of people looking for work. Our research found there are 3X more people looking for work than the official 'tip of the iceberg' number states! Lilia Anderson and Matt Grudnoff explain. #auspol #ausecon

entry.title: "The fact that you've got two whistleblowers on trial right now in Australia... sends a really chilling effect to other whistleblowers who might be thinking about speaking up." - Kieran Pender, senior lawyer at the Human Rights Law Centre Watch the full w
entry.content: "The fact that you've got two whistleblowers on trial right now in Australia... sends a really chilling effect to other whistleblowers who might be thinking about speaking up." - Kieran Pender, senior lawyer at the Human Rights Law Centre Watch the full webinar on Whistleblowing in Australia, link in bio. #auspol

entry.title: [Pacific Island leaders] have been very clear in what they expect from Australia...when it comes to partnering to host a COP. "Is Australia really a credible host? Why should we host an event when they've ignored our requests for years?" Listen to the la
entry.content: [Pacific Island leaders] have been very clear in what they expect from Australia...when it comes to partnering to host a COP. "Is Australia really a credible host? Why should we host an event when they've ignored our requests for years?" Listen to the latest episode of our Follow the Money podcast, link in bio. #auspol #climate
